mapper.select: SELECT HO_HOSPITAL_CODE as hoHospitalCode, GO_CITIZEN_ID as goCitizenId, HO_PATIENT_GENDER as hoPatientGender, HO_PATIENT_NAME as hoPatientName, HO_PATIENT_PHONE as hoPatientPhone, HO_ZIP_CODE as hoZipCode, HO_PATIENT_ADDRESS as hoPatientAddress, HO_PATIENT_DETAIL_ADDRESS as hoPatientDetailAddress FROM ho_patient WHERE HO_PATIENT_CODE = #{hoPatientCode}
